content: In the tech industry, we use controlled experiments to learn and make decisions at every step of product development, from design to algorithms. A common question I, as a data scientist, often get from software engineers and business partners is can we continuously monitor the p-value and declare victory whenever it is below 0.05?

A common question I, as a data scientist, often get from software engineers and business partners is can we continuously monitor the p-value and declare victory whenever it is below 0.05?
summary: In the tech industry, we use controlled experiments to learn and make decisions at every step of product development, from design to algorithms. When the experiment is about a single change, such as changing the layout of the UI or using a different machine learning algorithm, the methodology is often called A/B testing. While is all fashionable and new to use A/B testing, the technique behind the scene, hypothesis testing, has been around for a long time.
title: How does early stopping affect A/B experiment?

title: Notes | Crucial Conversation

content: 写作是一件很主观的事情。书里规则提供了帮助我们写出更好文章的起始点，但绝对不是终点，因此我们也不应该过分教条，就像此书出现的各种“例外”一样，我们也应该因地制宜。
description: 写作是一件很主观的事情。书里规则提供了帮助我们写出更好文章的起始点，但绝对不是终点，因此我们也不应该过分教条，就像此书出现的各种“例外”一样，我们也应该因地制宜。

summary: Elementary Rules Of Usage 1. Form the possessive singular of nouns by add ‘s. 2. In a series of three or more terms with a single conjunction, use a comma after each term except the last. 3. Enclose parenthetic expressions between commas. 4. Place a comma before conjunction introducing an independent clause. 5. Do not join independent clauses with a comma. 6. Do not break sentences in two.
title: Notes | The Element of Style

content: 时隔一年零两个月又八天，在生日的当天迎着湿润温暖的海风再次降落在夏威夷。这次选择的第一站是 Island of Hawaii，也就是因为面积最大而得名的大岛 （big island）。不同于购物天堂的欧胡、海清沙白的茂宜，大岛最大的吸引力就是变幻莫测—让人一天之内体验四季，顺便颠覆对海岛的刻板印象。

summary: “No alien land in all the world has any deep strong charm for me but that one, no other land could so longingly and so beseechingly haunt me, sleeping and walking, through half a lifetime, as that one has done." – Mark Twain 夏威夷的七天，仿佛逃离尘世的七天，所有的工作、寒冷
title: Aloha, Hawaii
